body: This is such a well done story I love it. I wish there was a story where Rito is engaged to all the girls that are in love with him, he isn't the king just yet but in training being like a space diplomat but we get to see Yami an Rito growing up to getting with everyone else. like yami finding out she's pregnant an being surprised an overjoyed that a living weapon/Assassin could find such happiness bliss with Rito + extended family/friends. I could imagine her to be I little overprotective of her child. I guess It would be nice to see how people would draw up a mother Yami an what kind of story.
Wew, vewy nice, bust nuts multiple times. UwU, 19/10, will bust again
Awesome doujin, this is one of my best
Amazing. Wow. This is the best one i have readen this week yet. 10/10
I would love to see this animated since I believe that Yami has the most feelings for Rito it's just she never really pursues her feelings or emotions.
This artist needs to do a Mikan doujin.
